column4: Hey - I've noticed a problem that wasn't here when I upgraded to gutsy - now I'm having trouble with the full screen modes of firefox and totem. Have other people been reporting this?
what problems are you seeing with full screen modes of firefox and totem?
well with totem it wouldn't exit full screen for some movies (had to restart gdm) and for firefox it got 'stuck' between full and regular when I pressed f11
have you tried disabling the visual effects (compiz) and see if this problem is still apparent?
afaik the're not enabled on my computer
it didn't use to be a problem - it worked fine for a while after I upgraded to gutsy
right click on desktop -> Change desktop background - > Visual Effects Tab -> Click on None  (this is assuming you are using gutsy)
it's already set to 'none'. I think it might have been a bug in one of the recent upgrades
i've just tried the F11 thing in firefox here and i'm not having the same issue, it does sound to me like it is a video driver issue
hmm, wonder if there's anything else I can try... I'll make sure that firefox and totem still do it
are you using a nvidia card?
desertc_: i didn't know I had to do anything at all! Everyone who was using nvidia-glx has to install nvidia-glx-new?

nvidia-glx-new is just a new nvidia driver than the nvidia-glx package.  I have found to have less issues with nvidia-glx-new that I was having with the old driver, its worth a try if you are using nvidia-glx
ok. I think last time I did it, the memory and the cpu were probably more taxed than usual, because I had like 30 tabs open
